documentation.text: The WarpVaultLPFactory contract is designed to produce individual WarpVaultLP contracts*
The WarpVaultLPFactory contract is designed to produce individual WarpVaultLP contracts*

params._lp: is the address for the LP token this Warp Vault will manage
params._lpName: is the name of the LP token (ex:wETH-wBTC)*
params._timelock: is a variable representing the number of seconds the timeWizard will prevent withdraws and borrows from a contracts(one week is 605800 seconds)

createWarpVaultLP(uint256,address,string.notice: createWarpVaultLP allows the contract owner to create a new WarpVaultLP contract for a specific LP token

userdoc.notice: The WarpVaultLPFactory contract is designed to produce individual WarpVaultLP contracts*
